name: Ruby & Rusty Competition Edition
description:
Join competition here: http://streamyard.com/svb7ai66hd Controls: X - Jump X or A - Pick up, throw Arrows - Move Return/Enter - Start Tab - Select Things to Know:
  • Get one point if you beat a challenge
  • If Ruby or Rusty explode, you lose the challenge
  • If the Witch attacks, you get a chance for an extra point! Defeat the Witch to get that extra point
  • No cheating
  • Sometimes you will get a bonus roll or something surprising will happen 
  • If shipping to the winner costs more than $10 I will request the difference to be paid 
Playing the competition means you agree with the contest rules. Click here to read them
